snippet.title: 『人生オワタの大冒険2』Owata 2 - Full Playthrough | Translated | Death Showcase, Minimal Deaths
snippet.description:
Remember Owata, that flash game from 2005? Inspiration to I Wanna Be The Guy and Syobon Action? Well, the creator came out with a sequel in memorial of flash player's end of life this December. ＼(^o^)／

I tried to show off all the major death events while keeping the brevity of the video. I messed up a few times and died in places where I didn't want to show off a death, but for the most part I think it's pretty solid. I just really wanted to do this gem justice and let those who don't have the skill or patience still experience what there is to experience.

Good luck, Owata.

(Localisation by @chordbug on Twitter)
